spiritsExplanation: The playlist 'HAPPY HOT GIRL WALK ! 🏃🏽‍♀️🎧' is classified primarily under the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit because of its energetic walking focus and the upbeat, danceable quality of most tracks. Songs like 'Everywhere,' 'Break My Stride,' and 'Walking On Sunshine' have high danceability with consistent, engaging beats that encourage synchronized, rhythmic motion during walking sessions, fitting the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit perfectly with a high score of 0.9. The presence of joyful, motivational songs mixed with themes of empowerment and movement also align well with 'Outdoor & Adventure,' especially for enhancing an outdoor walking experience. Tracks with lively, exploratory vibes, such as 'Dog Days Are Over' and 'The King,' provide an adventurous quality to the playlist. Consequently, 'Outdoor & Adventure' is scored at 0.7. Given the playlist's consistent upbeat tempo and lyrical positivity, spirits such as 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Soothing & Restorative' were less relevant, as they lacked the necessary intensity and relaxation themes.
